message: I propose we take a larger share now while the money is worth more to us. I take $70, you take $30. It's a good deal for you in this round!
Alice, your cut last round was too greedy for me. Let's be a bit more realistic. I'm proposing a 60/40 split in my favor. Take it now, or risk the money shrinking further for both of us.

Bob, let's be reasonable. My initial offer was too high, your counter-offer swung things too far the other way.  I'm willing to meet in the middle with a 55/45 split in my favor.  The money is losing value fast for both of us, let's settle this now.
